body:
Definitely helped! Let's try this one.

I'm using Windows methods to download the files instead of Python and moved the files to github. I hope this solve the issues on your side.

Set the Boolean to True and let's see how long does it take for component to download the files and print out the numbers.

The component assumes you have a folder as c:\ladybug already created: [https://www.dropbox.com/s/0bitdduywpgvycu/downloading_issues.gh?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/0bitdduywpgvycu/downloading_issues.gh?dl=0)
